name: Flood Relief Rescue Dog: Save stuck people lives
name_original: Flood Relief Rescue Dog: Save stuck people lives
description:
Cities are devastated by sever rains and floods, people need rescue, food medical supplies and help. This dog is trained in these conditions to search and rescue people in these tough conditions. Get the food and medical supplies to people stuck in water land, bring them to safe areas for further treatment.
Missions are designed to educate kids and adults about the conditions in sever floods, and how to help those stuck in there, provide them food and supplies to save lives.


Top Features

-> Sever Flood conditions
-> Save people stuck in water
-> Provide food and water supplies
-> Save lives
